lines.text: I need to talk to Olija about the finals! It will al be a big adventure!
Good day, headmaster! I am here to...
Are you here for your final tests? Good. As I can see you haven't got your team yet. You need to fix it.
But... I thought you will assign me a team, isn't that how things work?
No, it's not. You can choose who you pass your exams with. All people have their strength and weaknesses.
It's up you to to figure out what works best. Do you understand?
I guess so. So what should I do?
Check out the garden. It's a popular place for students to rest and socialise. Get back to me when you have a team of 4.
